ComicInfo.Summary:
Robyn, has been electrocuted, imprisoned, beaten and nearly killed on numerous occasions during her stay in the other-dimensional prison, The Dungeon. With the hope of an escape home to New York looking less likely with each passing minute, Robyn must pull together every last ounce of strength she has to make one final stand, or risk remaining trapped on this island forever.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Ediano Silva & Ceci de la Cruz | 1 | B | Cover B | Netho Diaz & Sanju Nivangune | 2 | C | Cover C | Cris Delara | 3 | D | Cover D | Antonio Bifulco & Sanju Nivangune | 4 | E | Staff Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 25 | Sabine Rich | Missing | F | VIP Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Sabine Rich | Missing | G | Webstore Only Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 150 | Keith Garvey | Missing |
